description.value:
As a swift action, you can manifest a pair of translucent, cloud-like wings that grant you a fly speed of 60 feet with good maneuverability.

At 10th level, your speed increases to 90 feet and your maneuverability increases to perfect.

You can use these wings for 1 minute per day per oracle level. This duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-minute increments.

You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation.
